subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mike Ilitch, the Little Caesars pizza mogul who owns the Detroit Tigers and the Detroit Red Wings, said that he wants to buy the Detroit Pistons in order to keep the team in Detroit.
snippet: Mike Ilitch, the Little Caesars pizza mogul who owns the Detroit Tigers and the Detroit Red Wings, said that he wants to buy the Detroit Pistons in order to keep the team in Detroit.
